Package com.nrg948.preferences

Class PIDControllerPreference

java.lang.Object
com.nrg948.preferences.PreferenceValue
com.nrg948.preferences.PIDControllerPreference
All Implemented Interfaces:
Sendable
public class PIDControllerPreference extends PreferenceValue implements Sendable
Manages a PIDController whose gains are stored in WPILib Preferences. This class provides a preference-backed wrapper around a PID controller so that kP, kI, and kD can be tuned at runtime without recompiling code.

The internal PIDController instance is configured using the stored preference values, allowing this class to be used anywhere a regular PIDController would be used, while automatically persisting and retrieving gains from the robot preferences. In addition, it implements Sendable so that its parameters can be exposed to dashboards and other tools.
